overview.en: Various countries in the world are increasing the economic benefits of crops. We hope to increase the agricultural planting capacity and increase the survival benefits for the global agricultural practitioners in the field of economic crops. Industrial cannabis (CBD) as the main economic crop, CBD (cannabidiol) oil is better: reduce pain, reduce coke deficiency and depression, reduce cancer-related symptoms and symptoms caused by drug treatment, and have neuroprotective properties; To enable CBD to be well applied to daily medicine and reduce the suffering of more people; we combine the characteristics of cash crops, medical industry, makeup industry, food industry, etc., we create an advanced comprehensive business platform based on blockchain technology Best Biology Resource Chain.
overview.zh: 全球各個國家部在提升農作物經濟收益，我們希望能夠在經濟作物領域為全球農業從業者提升農業種植產能、提高生存收益。工業大麻（CBD)作為主要經濟作物，CBD(大麻二酚）油主更好處：減輕疼痛、減輕焦虛和抑鬱症，減少與癌症有關的症狀以及藥物治療引起的症狀、具有神經保護特性；為了使CBD 能夠很好的運用到日常醫藥中，減少更多人的痛苦；我們結合經濟作物、醫療行業、化妝行業、食品行業等特性，我們打造一個基於區塊鏈技術，先進的綜合型商業平台公鏈Best Biology Resource Chain。
